channel.title: Making things "member only"
channel.description:
hello moparscape,
i need help with my rs remake
i use a source thats only f2p but i am working on p2p and i want make objects (gates) members only and weapons also members only and if i use a knife on logs than you get fletching xp i want to make it that you do and you are a non-member, that the server says "this is a members only feature"
i hope someone could help me thank you!

item.title: Making things "member only"
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

I’m going to be the meanest I have ever been in my life:

  1. Don’t try and do a remake with Delta, you’ll fail.
  2. If you can’t even make a simple if-then statement, don’t try to make a full fletched remake.
  3. I doubt you can make a boolean which saves to a character file, and if you can’t do that you won’t be able to.
  4. Try learning at least a basic knowledge of Java before trying to do something like this.

inb4flame

Read full topic

item.title: Making things "member only"
item.dc:creator: @jmk600 jmk600
item.description:
@jmk600 wrote:

if (donator == 0) { for (int element2 : membersItem) { if (wearID == element2) { sM("You must be a member to wear this item."); return false; } } }]

If that doesn’t work then idk sorry

Read full topic
